Content:
Lock in the enemy scale? This will level up all non-player characters in the world to the the set level.
This cannot be undone.
<font color='#BBFF00' size='23'>*[1] beings gained a new level of power...*</font>
<font color='#FF3737' size='23'>The EUO Singleplayer mod is active, yet the game is no longer singleplayer. Upgrade Info will not be synced for players.</font>
